javadoc: Exception thrown if plugin was not found.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct PluginException with a detail message.

methods.javadoc:
Construct a PluginException with the given message.
@param message message that is returned in the getMessage() method
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct a PluginException with the given message.

params.name: message
params.comment: message that is returned in the getMessage() method

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct a PluginException with the given message and cause.

methods.name: getPluginException
methods.comment:
Creates a new PluginException by appending the message from 
 this exception to the message of the given exception if it
 is not null. If e is null, returns this exception.

params.name: e
params.comment:
exception whose message will be appended to this
 exceptions message if e is not null

return.comment: this exception if e is null, or a new exception

name: PluginException
comment: Exception thrown if plugin was not found.
